bugtrap03.bugdomain.notification

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.bugdomain.notification.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a notification.
    Author:
    group 03

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Notification(java.lang.String notification, BugReport bugReport, Subject subject)
      The constructor for a new notification with a given notification, a bugreport of which an attribute has changed, the subject for the subscription that created the notification.

                    BugReport bugReport,

        Parameters:
        notification - The string message for this notification
        bugReport - The bugreport of which an attribute has changed.
        subject - The subject from the subscription that creates the notification.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isValidSubject

        public boolean isValidSubject(Subject subject)
        This method checks the validity of a given subject.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given subject is not null.

      • open

        public java.lang.String open(User user)
        This method returns a string representation of this notification when 'opened'. It gives a standard textual denial if the notification is private for the given User. If not, it returns a string containing the message, bugreport name and subject name.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that wishes to open this notification.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the contents of this notification.

        Parameters:
        object - The given object to compare
        Returns:
        true if the object is a notification with the same attributes as this notification.
